message:
রাজনীতির যবনিকা টেনে, এখন সমর নীতি শুরু করা উচিৎ। Within one or two days everything will be over. Make history tomorrow, make it happen; do not move or falter, stay for a few days and your victory will be guaranteed Insha Allah.
United we stand, divided we fall. Do not be upset by a few set backs or lack of mentioning of your prisoners, persevere, for surely after every difficulty there is ease.
